config.mod_enabled.name: Enable Mod
config.mod_enabled.desc: Turn the entire mod on or off.
config.random_mode.name: Enable Random Mode
config.random_mode.desc: If enabled, brightness changes randomly based on the frequency.
config.frequency.name: Random Frequency
config.frequency.desc: How often the brightness percent changes.
config.min_percent.name: Darkest Limit %
config.min_percent.desc: The darkest the day can get (e.g. -20 for 20% darker). Max is -50.
config.max_percent.name: Lightest Limit %
config.max_percent.desc: The lightest the day can get (0 = Normal Day).
config.manual.desc: Set the brightness percentage for this specific week (-50% to 0%).
